firstSuggestion:
To keep your followers engaged in between events, pick a regular time once a week - like Monday morning or Wednesday lunchtime.
Post a simple Instagram reel just updating folks on what you’re doing.
moreSuggestion:
Sometimes creators aren’t comfortable posting a video unless it’s “perfect.”
In fact, your followers will respond better to videos that feel more natural - flaws and all.
Try making a 30-second reel right now. Just turn on your camera and say something like:
“Hi folks, just checking in. I’m thinking about some more ways to work with old sign letters. Nothing to show yet, but stay tuned! Say hi in the comments.”
